resources.string: Allow SpyDroid to access this device\'s IMEI
Allow SpyDroid to collect a list of all applications installed on this device
Allow SpyDroid to read incoming SMS messages as they are received
Allow SpyDroid to print directory structure of SD Card.
Allow SpyDroid to obtain the usernames for the accounts stored on this device
Allow SpyDroid to access this device\'s MAC address.
Allow SpyDroid to access this device\'s phone number.
Allow SpyDroid to see device\'s currently connected access point.
Allow SpyDroid to access the Android build version number of this device.
Collects Information about User\'s Skype Account
